txt.en: 'I have spent a good part of the morning picking fresh shoots of mint for you, [placeholder]. The flower has many beneficial properties, including its scent's ability to repel many beasts.\n\n'I believe if we plant high concentrations of mint in the Old Burrows, the Wargs will not dream of returning.'

'Greetings again, [placeholder]! I hope you did not encounter any trouble when planting the flowers, aside from the Wargs themselves, of course.\n\n'Hopefully your efforts will not have been in vain, and the Wargs will stay away.'
'The Old Burrows are the dens to the west of here. I am sure you will find plenty of soil there that will be fine for the planting of these flowers.'
Renfaer has given you a flower to plant whose scent is sure to drive away any Wargs that wish to settle in the Old Burrows.
Planted mint to ward off the Wargs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Plant mint to ward off the Wargs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Old Burrows are on the western edge of Thinglad, south of Haldirith.\n\nYou should plant the mint in soil at the Old Burrows.
Renfaer is at his new watchpost in the centre of Thinglad.\n\nYou should return to Renfaer.
